title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 7 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 7! SEVEN. I did meal prep yesterday. Here’s a video: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Tracy Benjamin (@shutterbean) Here’s a photo: Meal Prep this week includes: meat & potatoes (leftovers) deviled eggs thai broccoli salad (recipe soon!) white rice washed romaine applesauce fire cider sliced cheddar broccoli pickled onions maple olive oil banana bread (not pictured!) sliced onions chopped green onions cooked bacon blue cheese dressing shredded carrots We have Valentine’s Day coming up this wee. Here’s some menu inspiration: Valentine’s Day Recipes! Simple Valentine’s Day Ideas Here are my Intentions for the Week! Intentions this Week This week’s intentions: Mind/Body doctor’s appointment morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar art time floss daily horoscope open forum on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins stay hydrated read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week i love lists record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools post hobo daily pages post recipe organize tax stuff hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In! upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace bookkeeping/pay bills emails go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles laundry put down mulch plant things litterboxes water indoor plants go through pantry compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions: Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar art time floss daily horoscope journal hour on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins movie night (with the boys) stay hydrated read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week i love lists record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools finish january pages tax stuff hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In! upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace bookkeeping/pay bills emails go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office clear off work tables laundry put down mulch plant things dinner with dad litterboxes water indoor plants go through pantry compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire: Recipes for When You’re Sick Lasagna Cups Broccoli Fritters Chicken Lettuce Cups Avocado Kimchi Toast Sausage Kale French Bread Pizza Homemade Pizza Bagels If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! Here’s a mood: Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!! You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. Those are my Intentions for the Week! Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU! The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list/planner started by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean.com & The Handwriting Club!
text: Intentions for the Week- Week 7 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 7! SEVEN.  I did meal prep yesterday. Here’s a video: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Tracy Benjamin (@shutterbean) Here’s a photo: Meal Prep this week includes:  meat & potatoes (leftovers) deviled eggs thai broccoli salad (recipe soon!)  white rice  washed romaine applesauce  fire cider sliced cheddar  broccoli pickled onions maple olive oil banana bread (not pictured!) sliced onions chopped green onions cooked bacon blue cheese dressing shredded carrots  We have Valentine’s Day coming up this wee. Here’s some menu inspiration: Valentine’s Day Recipes! Simple Valentine’s Day Ideas Here are my Intentions for the Week!  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body doctor’s appointment morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope open forum on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools  post hobo daily pages  post recipe organize tax stuff hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office clear off work tables laundry  put down mulch plant things dinner with dad litterboxes water indoor plants  go through pantry  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire:   Recipes for When You’re Sick  Lasagna Cups Broccoli Fritters  Chicken Lettuce Cups  Avocado Kimchi Toast  Sausage Kale French Bread Pizza  Homemade Pizza Bagels If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood:  Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
html:
Intentions for the Week- Week 7 in 2025

Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 7! SEVEN. 

I did meal prep yesterday. Here’s a video:

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Tracy Benjamin (@shutterbean)

Here’s a photo:

Meal Prep this week includes: 

  • meat & potatoes (leftovers)
  • deviled eggs
  • thai broccoli salad (recipe soon!) 
  • white rice 
  • washed romaine
  • applesauce 
  • fire cider
  • sliced cheddar 
  • broccoli
  • pickled onions
  • maple olive oil banana bread (not pictured!)
  • sliced onions
  • chopped green onions
  • cooked bacon
  • blue cheese dressing
  • shredded carrots 

We have Valentine’s Day coming up this wee. Here’s some menu inspiration:

Valentine’s Day Recipes!

Simple Valentine’s Day Ideas

Here are my Intentions for the Week! 

Intentions this Week 

This week’s intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • doctor’s appointment
  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • move body daily
  • breath work
  • work in Currently workbook
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • open forum on The Hope Circuit
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • post hobo daily pages 
  • post recipe
  • organize tax stuff
  • hope circuit check in
  • figure out next binder class
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • organize my office
  • paper piles 
  • laundry 
  • put down mulch
  • plant things
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Last Week’s Intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • move body daily
  • breath work
  • work in Currently workbook
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • journal hour on The Hope Circuit
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • movie night (with the boys)
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • finish january pages
  • tax stuff
  • hope circuit check in
  • figure out next binder class
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • organize my office
  • clear off work tables
  • laundry 
  • put down mulch
  • plant things
  • dinner with dad
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Posts to Inspire: 

 Recipes for When You’re Sick 

Lasagna Cups

Broccoli Fritters 

Chicken Lettuce Cups 

Avocado Kimchi Toast 

Sausage Kale French Bread Pizza 

Homemade Pizza Bagels

If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! 

Here’s a mood: 

Mantra for the week!

Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. 

My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year!

I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. 

It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! 

Need extra help? Join my accountability group:

SELF-CHECK-IN

We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. 

Those are my Intentions for the Week! 

Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
